nodes.bodyText: I have not changed anything in the json, only made it a protected static member.

I guess our map-based filtering will now behave differently than direct xContent filtering. This seems okay to me, since I think it already diverged -- map-based filtering preserves empty objects, whereas xContent filtering doesn't?
yes, preserving empty objects was until now the main difference between the two way of filtering, and with this change we also preserve empty arrays.
